title: Breaking Point
description: Pixie and her friends, Dusty and Rose, are part of an elite fighting force that is trying to survive in a world overrun by a hideous virus that turns people into monsters called Arachna. Pixie is the ultimate warrior and will stop at nothing to protect Dusty, Rose and her village, even if that means turning herself into a weapon by an injection that could possibly kill her.
author: Kayla Gibfried
